SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Vision relative to AetherSports Channel?
SRP.A: Crimson Vision is {above} AetherSports Channel in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Sports Network relative to Crimson Vision?
SRP.A: Echo Sports Network is {below} Crimson Vision in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Vision relative to Nova Broadcast?
SRP.A: Crimson Vision is {above} Nova Broadcast in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total tv ratings?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Sports Network}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total tv ratings?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Broadcast}.

NC.Q: Between 2013 and 2018, did the total TV Ratings experience a larger or smaller change than between 2012 and 2019?

NC.Q: Was the total TV Ratings in 2014 higher or lower than in 2017?

NC.A: The change in total tv ratings between 2012 and 2014 was {smaller} than between 2010 and 2019.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Sports Network} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Vision and AetherSports Channel first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Vision and AetherSports Channel first exchanged leading positions in {2015}.
